open.title: Vumatel outage | Malvern
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Malvern, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Vuma Villages Outage | Gauteng
closed.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Gauteng, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.
closed.resolution: A network change has been implemented and we continue to monitor for network stability. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

updates.content: A network change has been implemented and we continue to monitor for network stability. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Afrihost, Vumatel and Vendor tech teams have found a solution that should stop the intermittent drops in the interim till permanent solution can be implemented.

01/12/2022 | 17:22 | Afrihost, Vumatel and Vendor tech teams are still actively troubleshooting the root cause of the ongoing intermittent connection experienced.

01/12/2022 | 15:07 | Afrihost and Vumatel engineers are actively troubleshooting the ongoing intermittent connection. We apologise for the inconvenience.

01/12/2022 | 13:07 | Further impacts have been detected. Afrihost and Vumatel are currently troubleshooting the root cause. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

01/12/2022 | 13:07 | Afrihost engineers have detected another impact which was subsequently mitigated by the Vumatel team. We continue to engage with Vumatel to find a permanent solution. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
